feature.name: openhab-ui-cometvisu
feature.config:
webFolder=../../../CometVisu/src/ webAlias=/cometvisu
icons>enableMapping=true
icons.mapping>firstfloor=control_building_int_og icons.mapping>groundfloor=control_building_int_eg icons.mapping>cellar=control_building_int_kg icons.mapping>garden=scene_garden icons.mapping>sun=weather_sun icons.mapping>video=scene_livingroom icons.mapping>kitchen=scene_dinner icons.mapping>bath=scene_bath icons.mapping>corridor=scene_hall icons.mapping>office=scene_office icons.mapping>boy1=scene_childs_room icons.mapping>bedroom=scene_sleeping icons.mapping>heating=sani_heating icons.mapping>temperature=temp_temperature icons.mapping>contact=fts_window_1w
